Flame Blade Tips & Notes for BG 3

Upcast: Cast as a 4th Level or higher, damage increases by 1d6 Fire for every two Spell Slot Levels above 2nd. It uses the spellcasting ability of the class (WIS for Druid) or race (CHA for Tiefling) that gave you the spell. Never adds Ability Modifiers (such as from Strength of Dexterity).
